page.title: 07Farming Springfield Barnes
page.content: {Springfield Barnes Farm,Barnes Mill {Road, Chelmsford. {Oil seed rape.}Part of Robert Fleming's land is in our block. He grows 60 hectares of winter barley, 40 hectares of winter seed rape, 8 hectares of french dwarf beans and 40 hectares of grass.He has 70 head of beef cattle, one horse and one dog, also Highland cattle. In the same field were Hereford calves.Mr Fleming's son picked some oil seed rape for us to take back to school. When little white worms get inside the oil seed rape they eat the inside and the seeds go rotten.Oil seed rape is grown for the oil which is obtained from the ripe seeds. This oil is used for margarine.
